short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to the toolbar that allows you to open a popup Discord window outside browser tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A popup window is a window without the navigation and the tab bar, so it will use much less vertical space and gives you the same feeling of local client.
